messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Christmas sale on Tsuba.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rich, If you reduce the taikan to USD425 I ll take them, bye the way did you get paid for the Fuller/Gregory book? I thought the low feedback was odd.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rich,
If you reduce the taikan to USD425 I'll take them, bye the way did you get
paid for the Fuller/Gregory book? I thought the low feedback was odd.
Regards,
Alan

----- Original Message -----
From: "Richard Turner" <ikkanshi@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 22, 2004 12:30 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Christmas sale on Tsuba.



All, we have put up a few Christmas bargains to temp you with, I have
added free shipping to my tsuba ( not the Shinshinto Taikan though sorry
but I have reduced the price ) Take a look, grab a bargain.

Merry Christmas and a safe New Year to you all

Rich Turner

http://members.westnet.com.au/whiz/richard/sale/nihonto_sales_page.htm




--
Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board <http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>

/- for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/


--
